page.title: 12Social Matters
page.content: A few of the families in this area receive social security payments, and some of the eldery people have meals on wheels at 95p per meal. Families with children receive child benefit payments. A doctor has a surgery 3 times a week in Amberley Village, those living nearer to Storrington or Pulborough attend the doctor in those villages. The nearest dentist is in Storrington. The nearest hospitals in Chichester or Worthing and the nearest employment office is in Littlehampton. A district nurse attends those who need care at home. The Amberley Society was founded in 1976 to protect the Wildbrooks from drainage by the Southern Water Authority. It receives a great deal of support from local people and societies interested in conservation. It watches over conservation matters.
